categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kodo was a Human male who served as a private in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, he was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Private Kodo first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as a Crew Skill Trade Vendor on Ilum for the Empire.
